Sample_source_name_ch1: ARID1A was profiled in parental RMG-1
Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: Doxycicline (2ug/ml, 72 hours) was used to induced the knock-down of ARID1A with a TET-inducible shRNA.
Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: RMG-1 cells were maintained in DMEM/F12 50/50 medium (Corning) supplemented with 10% (v/v) of TET-free fetal bovine serum (Clontech) or super calf serum (GEMcell) and 2 mM of L-glutamine (Corning).
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: NEBNext ChIP-Seq ULTRAII DNA Sample Prep Kit (New England Biolabs, inc.)
Sample_data_processing: Quality Control FastQC, Adapter Trimming TRIM-GALORE, alignment (ChIPseq, ATAC-seq) BWA, alignment (RNAseq) STAR, tag density files deepTools package was used to generate BigWiggle files
Supplementary_files_format_and_content: strand specific bigWig, compatible with UCSC Genome Browser, were generated using the deepTools package (bamCoverage function, with RPGC [reads per genome coverage] normalization)
chip antibody: Abcam ab97995
